activities.name: Robotics Team Captain
activities.description: Led 15-person robotics team to state championships

activities.name: Math Tutoring
activities.impact: Helped 20+ students improve grades by 1+ letter grade

core_values.description: Using technology to solve real-world problems

defining_moments.title: First Robot Competition Victory
defining_moments.description: Leading team to unexpected victory after months of setbacks
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Profound sense of accomplishment and team unity
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Persistence and collaboration can overcome any obstacle

defining_moments.title: Mentoring Through Math Tutoring
defining_moments.description: Volunteering as a math tutor taught me the power of patience and personalized teaching. Witnessing students' grades improve, I realized the profound impact of sharing knowledge and fostering confidence in others.

defining_moments.title: Unexpected Victory at Robotics Competition
defining_moments.description: Leading my team to an unexpected victory after months of setbacks instilled a deep sense of accomplishment and unity. This experience taught me that persistence and collaboration can overcome any obstacle.

defining_moments.title: Innovating for Real-World Solutions
defining_moments.description: Developing a device to assist the elderly with daily tasks showcased my commitment to innovation. The project reinforced my belief in using technology to solve real-world problems and improve lives.
